p: We used a modified CTAB buffer (Coyne et al., 2005; Dempster et al., 1999) (2% w/v cetyltrimethylammonium bromide, 2% w/v polyvinylpyrrolidone, 1.4M NaCl, 100 mM Tris‐HCl, 20 nM EDTA). This buffer was used due to reported success in retrieving good quality eDNA yield (Barnes et al., 2014; Dougherty et al., 2016; Renshaw et al., 2015; Turner et al., 2014).
